oai_dc:dc.dc:title: EuroParl-Uds
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Elke Teich, Lehrstuhl Englische Sprach- und Übersetzungswissenschaft, Fakultät P, Fachrichtung Sprachwissenschaft und Sprachtechnologie, Universität des Saarlandes, Campus A2.2, 66123 Saarbrücken, Germany
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Parliamentary debates
Proceedings of the European Parliament
Parallel corpus
Properties of translations
Monolingual comparable corpora
Translationese
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The **EuroParl-UdS** corpus is a parallel corpus consisting of parliamentary debates of the European Parliament containing texts filtered based of native speakers. It is presently available for English, German and Spanish and the data is in plain text format. It contains texts of the European Parliament that were produced between 1999-2017. More specifically it consists of parallel (sentence-aligned) corpora for English into German and English into Spanish, where the source side contains texts only by native English speakers, and comparable monolingual corpora for English, German and Spanish, containing texts only by native speakers of each language.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Lehrstuhl Englische Sprach- und Übersetzungswissenschaft, Fakultät P, Fachrichtung Sprachwissenschaft und Sprachtechnologie, Universität des Saarlandes, Campus A2.2, 66123 Saarbrücken, Germany
oai_dc:dc.dc:type: Corpus of Proceedings of the European Parliament
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Alina Karakanta, Mihaela Vela, and Elke Teich. 2018. “EuroParl-Uds: Preserving and Extending Metadata in Parliamentary Debates”. Proceedings of the LREC 2018. Miyazaki, Japan.
